text: Anthony Joseph Accardo (; born Antonino Leonardo Accardo, ; April 28, 1906 â€“ May 22, 1992), also known as "Joe Batters" and "Big Tuna", was an American longtime mobster. He was the boss of the Chicago Outfit from 1947 until 1972. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1992 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Chicago Outfit mobsters
title: Tony Accardo
